title: Montgomery Tully's TERROR STREET aka 36 HOURS (1953) movie trailer

sources.title: Montgomery Tully's TERROR STREET aka 36 HOURS (1953) movie trailer
sources.description: One of the early 1950s Hammer "films noirs", a couple of years before Scifi and Horror made their break in the English studios. more info on http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0046411/
